title: When I lose a game
body:
I want it to be because the opposing team outplayed us, not because ryze decided to feed nasus mid until he has 20 mejias stacks and then quit with our nocturne... all the while our jayce is getting ganked 24/7 because mid is a cakewalk and bot (us) were struggling.

And I thought we could still win when it became 17 minutes, ha!

replies.body:
dont play for wins, play for personal improvement. When your in low elo there are way to many htings that can decide a game therefore the only way you are going to get out of a low elo is to spend every second improving your own play.

Pick a lane, pick a champion or two. Watch guides, watch videos of pros playing those champions, improve mechanically, improve your game sense and improve your experience.
